languages.text: Став правой рукой Вольного Торговца, Джай Хейдари получила в управление несколько миров, но, спустя несколько лет покоя и процветания, она вновь начала проверять закон на прочность. Спустя десятилетие грехи ее превысили меру терпения слуг Императора, и она стала объектом охоты. Всю оставшуюся жизнь ей приходилось скрываться от мстителей, искавших ее головы.

After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.
languages.original_text: Став правой рукой Вольного Торговца, Джай Хейдари получила в управление несколько миров, но, спустя несколько лет покоя и процветания, она вновь начала проверять закон на прочность. Спустя десятилетие грехи ее превысили меру терпения слуг Императора, и она стала объектом охоты. Всю оставшуюся жизнь ей приходилось скрываться от мстителей, искавших ее головы.

traits.locale_text: After accepting the position of the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds under her management. Yet several years of peace and prosperity later she once again started probing the law, testing it. A decade later her sins went beyond the limits of the patience of Emperor's servants, and she became hunted. For the rest of her life, she had to hide — from those looking for her head and for vengeance — in the remote corners of the Expanse.

After accepting the position of the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds under her management. Yet several years of peace and prosperity later she once again started probing the law, testing it. A decade later her sins went beyond the limits of the patience of Emperor's servants, and she became hunted. For the rest of her life, she had to hide — from those looking for her head and for vengeance — in the remote corners of the Expanse.

After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds under her management. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began testing the law's integrity. Within a decade, her transgressions had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became hunted. For the rest of her life, she had to hide in the remote corners of the Expanse from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds under her management. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began testing the law's integrity. Within a decade, her transgressions had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became hunted. For the rest of her life, she had to hide in the remote corners of the Expanse from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide in the remote corners of the Expanse from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

languages.text: 婕伊·海达利成为行商浪人的得力助手之后，将数个世界置于她的管理之下。然而，在最初几年的和平与繁荣之后，她再次开始挑战法律的极限。不到十年，她的越轨行为就超出了帝国的忍耐限度，她也沦为帝国的悬赏对象。在余生之中，她不得不东躲西藏，躲避那些渴望复仇……和想要砍掉她脑袋的人。
languages.original_text: After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

traits.locale_text: 成为行商浪人的得力助手之后，婕伊·海达利将数个世界置于她的管理之下。然而，在最初几年的和平与繁荣之后，她再次尝试钻法律的空子。不到十年，她的越轨行为就超出了帝国的忍耐极限，她也沦为帝国的追杀对象。在余生之中，她不得不躲在科罗努斯扩区的偏远角落，躲避那些渴望复仇……和想要砍掉她脑袋的人。

languages.text: Als rechte Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde Jae Heydari mit der Verwaltung mehrerer Welten betraut. Doch nach einigen Jahren des Friedens und Wohlstands begann sie erneut, das Gesetz zu beugen, um zu sehen, ob es brechen würde. Nach nicht einmal einem Jahrzehnt hatte sie mit ihren Verbrechen die Geduld des Imperiums schon ausgereizt und wurde zur Gejagten. Den Rest ihres Lebens musste sie sich vor denen verbergen, die Rache wollten ... und ihren Kopf.
languages.original_text: After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

traits.locale_text: Als rechte Hand {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wurde Jae Heydari mit der Verwaltung mehrerer Welten betraut. Doch nach einigen Jahren des Friedens und Wohlstands begann sie erneut, die Grenzen der Gesetze auszuloten. Nach nicht einmal einem Jahrzehnt hatte sie mit ihren Fehltritten die Geduld des Imperiums schon ausgereizt und wurde zur Gejagten. Den Rest ihres Lebens musste sie sich in den abgelegenen Winkeln der Ausdehnung vor denen verbergen, die Rache wollten ... und ihren Kopf.

languages.text: Jae Heydari se vit confier la gestion de plusieurs mondes après avoir accepté le rôle de bras droit {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais il ne fallut que quelques années de paix et de prospérité pour qu'elle recommençât à flirter avec les limites de la loi. En moins d'une décennie, ses crimes finirent par mettre à mal la patience et l'Imperium qui mit sa tête à prix. Elle passa ainsi le reste de sa vie à fuir ceux qui criaient vengeance et voulaient attenter à sa vie.
languages.original_text: After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari se vit confier la gestion de plusieurs mondes après avoir accepté le rôle de bras droit {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, mais il ne fallut que quelques années de paix et de prospérité pour qu'elle fût à nouveau tentée de s'affranchir des lois. En moins d'une décennie, ses transgressions finirent par mettre à mal la patience et l'Imperium qui décida de se débarrasser d'elle. Elle passa ainsi le reste de sa vie à se cacher dans les recoins les plus reculés des Étendues pour échapper à ceux qui criaient vengeance et voulaient attenter à sa vie.

languages.text: Tras aceptar el puesto de mano derecha de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, Jae Heydari estuvo a cargo de varios mundos. No obstante, después de años de paz y prosperidad, comenzó una vez más a poner a prueba la palabra de la ley. En una década, sus delitos socavaron la paciencia del Imperium y se convirtió en fugitiva. Durante el resto de su vida, tuvo que ocultarse en los rincones más recónditos de la Extensión de quienes querían venganza... y su cabeza.
languages.original_text: After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

traits.locale_text: Tras aceptar el puesto de mano derecha de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, Jae Heydari estuvo a cargo de varios mundos. No obstante, después de años de paz y prosperidad, comenzó una vez más a poner a prueba la palabra de la ley. En una década, sus transgresiones socavaron la paciencia del Imperium y se convirtió en fugitiva. Durante el resto de su vida, tuvo que ocultarse en los rincones más recónditos de la Extensión de quienes querían venganza... y su cabeza.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の右腕として任を受けて以来、ジェイ・ヘイダリはいくつかの世界を監督することになった。だが、平和と繁栄が数年続くと、彼女はまた法を曲げ始めた。10年を待たずして、彼女は帝国の我慢の限界を超える犯罪を犯し、お尋ね者として追われる羽目になった。残りの人生は、復讐や賞金を狙う者たちから身を潜める生活を余儀なくされた。
languages.original_text: After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの右腕として任を受けて以来、ジェイ・ヘイダリはいくつかの世界を監督下に置いてきた。だが、平和と繁栄が数年続くと、彼女はまた法の網をかいくぐるようになる。10年を待たずして、彼女は帝国の我慢の限界を超える罪を犯し、お尋ね者として追われる羽目になった。その後はエクスパンスの僻地に隠れながら、復讐や賞金を狙う者たちから生涯にわたり身を潜める生活を余儀なくされた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in sağ kolu olmayı kabul ettikten sonra gözetmesi için Jae Heydari'ye birkaç dünya teslim edildi. Ancak Jae, birkaç yıl süren barış ve refahın ardından bir kez daha kanunları çiğneyip çiğneyemeyeceğini görmek için onları esnetmeye başladı. On yıl içinde işlediği suçlar, İmparatorluk'un sabrını taşırdı ve hakkında tutuklama kararı çıktı. Hayatının kalanında intikam peşinde olup canını almak isteyenlerden gizlenmek zorunda kaldı.
languages.original_text: After accepting a position as the Rogue Trader's right hand, Jae Heydari received several worlds to oversee. But after several years of peace and prosperity, she once again began bending the law to see if it would break. Within a decade, her crimes had exceeded the limits of the Imperium's patience, and she became a wanted woman. For the rest of her life, she was forced to hide from those who wanted vengeance... and her head.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in sağ kolu olmayı kabul ettikten sonra Jae Heydari'ye gözetmesi için birkaç dünya teslim edildi. Ancak Jae, birkaç yıl süren barış ve refahın ardından bir kez daha kanunları esnetmeye ve kırılıp kırılmayacaklarını denemeye başladı. On yıl içinde işlediği suçlar İmparatorluk'un sabrını taşırdı ve aranan bir kadın hâline geldi. Geriye kalan yaşamı boyunca intikam peşindekilerden gizlenmek zorunda kaldı. Ve de kellesinin peşindekilerden.
